adjective.description: Relating to or characteristic of the ancient region of Lydia in western Asia Minor or its inhabitants.
examples: a Lydian girl who is an excellent weaver

noun.description: A native or inhabitant of the ancient region of Lydia in western Asia Minor.
examples: they were conquered in the sixth century by Lydians

noun.description: The Anatolian language of the Lydians, of which some inscriptions and other texts have survived in a version of the Greek alphabet.
